description:
Players will be able to use Weekend Clothes outfits for the following 4 characters: Katsuki Bakugo, Minoru Mineta, Denki Kaminari, and Mina Ashido.
This pack also includes 10 color variations for each outfit.

Contents:
- Weekend Clothes outfits for Katsuki Bakugo, Minoru Mineta, Denki Kaminari, and Mina Ashido
- 10 outfit Color Variations for each Weekend Clothes outfit
name: MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2 Weekend Clothes 1-A Lively Set
